title: 'Is Kamala on a call?' Trump campaign gives 'zero' to Harris on 'acting skill'
content: In the video, as Harris boarded her jet, she waved to the cameras and then went inside. She had a wired earplug attached to her phone. "If you're going to pretend that you're on your phone in order to avoid answering questions from the press, you should probably do a little bit better on an acting job than holding your phone up to your ear while wearing wired headphones," Trump War Room posted.
summary: In the video, as Harris boarded her jet, she waved to the cameras and then went inside. She had a wired earplug attached to her phone. "If you're going to pretend that you're on your phone in order to avoid answering questions from the press, you should probably do a little bit better on an acting job than holding your phone up to your ear while wearing wired headphones," Trump War Room posted.

title: Donald Trump pats his back for choosing JD Vance: 'Initially, he was...'
content: Initially, Donald Trump was troubled as skeletons -- one after another -- started coming out of JD Vance's closet as he was unaware of the most incendiary remarks that were being unearthed, a New York Times Report said. But now Trump credits himself for the choice and compares himself to Hall of Fame football coach Vince Lombardi telling people that his eye for political taken was like Lombardi's ability to find Super Bowl caliber players.
summary: Initially, Donald Trump was troubled as skeletons -- one after another -- started coming out of JD Vance's closet as he was unaware of the most incendiary remarks that were being unearthed, a New York Times Report said. But now Trump credits himself for the choice and compares himself to Hall of Fame football coach Vince Lombardi telling people that his eye for political taken was like Lombardi's ability to find Super Bowl caliber players.

title: Russian guided bombs wound 13 in Ukraine's Kharkiv
content: At least 13 people were wounded in a Russian attack on Kharkiv, where guided bombs struck garages near residential buildings. Damaged structures include a private house and sports facility. This escalation follows Kyiv's incursion into Russia's Kursk region. Recent attacks have hit residential areas, a shopping mall, and an events complex, causing casualties and injuries.
summary: At least 13 people were wounded in a Russian attack on Kharkiv, where guided bombs struck garages near residential buildings. Damaged structures include a private house and sports facility. This escalation follows Kyiv's incursion into Russia's Kursk region. Recent attacks have hit residential areas, a shopping mall, and an events complex, causing casualties and injuries.

title: 'Clear risk that ... ': UK suspends arms export licenses to Israel
content: Britain has suspended 30 of 350 arms export licenses to Israel, citing risks of violations of international humanitarian law. Concurrently, the Biden administration prepares a final cease-fire and hostage-release proposal for Israel and Hamas, following the discovery of six dead hostages by Israeli forces in Gaza.
summary: Britain has suspended 30 of 350 arms export licenses to Israel, citing risks of violations of international humanitarian law. Concurrently, the Biden administration prepares a final cease-fire and hostage-release proposal for Israel and Hamas, following the discovery of six dead hostages by Israeli forces in Gaza.

title: 'We're very close ...': Joe Biden says Netanyahu not doing enough to secure hostage deal with Hamas
content: President Joe Biden remarked that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is not adequately working towards securing a deal for the release of hostages held by Hamas. Following the recovery of six hostages' bodies, Biden indicated he is close to presenting a final proposal, reflecting mounting pressures on Netanyahu amidst the ongoing Gaza conflict.
summary: President Joe Biden remarked that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is not adequately working towards securing a deal for the release of hostages held by Hamas. Following the recovery of six hostages' bodies, Biden indicated he is close to presenting a final proposal, reflecting mounting pressures on Netanyahu amidst the ongoing Gaza conflict.

title: 'Kamala Harris was in the room': White House is focusing on this message. Here's why
content: On August 1, there was a phone call between Biden and Netanyahu. The noting said: "Vice President Harris also joined the call". The Politico report said between October 7, the days of the Hamas attack on Israel and July 25 this year -- there was not a single mention of Kamala Harris in the official summaries.
summary: On August 1, there was a phone call between Biden and Netanyahu. The noting said: "Vice President Harris also joined the call". The  Politico report said between October 7, the days of the Hamas attack on Israel and July 25 this year -- there was not a single mention of Kamala Harris in the official summaries.

title: Kate Middleton's viral response to admirer saying 'waiting for you to be queen'
content: When William becomes King, Kate will take on the title of queen consort denoting that she would be queen by virtue of being married to a king and not monarch in her own right. By tradition, the "consort" is dropped soon after accession, with Kate likely thereafter to be known as "Queen Kate" or officially "Queen Catherine." This was how Camilla became Queen during her accession in 2022. ​​
summary: When William becomes King, Kate will take on the title of queen consort denoting that she would be queen by virtue of being married to a king and not monarch in her own right. By tradition, the "consort" is dropped soon after accession, with Kate likely thereafter to be known as "Queen Kate" or officially "Queen Catherine." This was how Camilla became Queen during her accession in 2022. ​​

title: The $37 billion mystery: Russian firm vanishes after posting record profit
Audi Italy boss Fabrizio Longo dies while climbing mountain, falls from 10,000 ft
content: Fabrizio Longo, Audi Italy's 62-year-old director, passed away after a fall from 10,000 feet in the Adamello mountains. He fell near the summit of Cima Paye, and his body was later retrieved from 700 ft inside the gorge and moved to Carisolo. Authorities are investigating the incident. Longo joined Audi in 2012 and became director a year later.
summary: Fabrizio Longo, Audi Italy's 62-year-old director, passed away after a fall from 10,000 feet in the Adamello mountains. He fell near the summit of Cima Paye, and his body was later retrieved from 700 ft inside the gorge and moved to Carisolo. Authorities are investigating the incident. Longo joined Audi in 2012 and became director a year later.

title: China-Philippines row opens new flashpoint in South China Sea
content: Chinese and Philippine ships have clashed in the South China Sea, specifically at Sabina Shoal. The Philippines deployed a significant coast guard vessel to the area, resulting in collisions and mutual allegations. This escalation jeopardizes the peace agreement reached in July regarding the Second Thomas Shoal, raising tensions once again.
summary: Chinese and Philippine ships have clashed in the South China Sea, specifically at Sabina Shoal. The Philippines deployed a significant coast guard vessel to the area, resulting in collisions and mutual allegations. This escalation jeopardizes the peace agreement reached in July regarding the Second Thomas Shoal, raising tensions once again.

title: Jill Stein vs AOC on social media: 'What's seriously predatory is...'
content: AOC called Jill Stein predatory and said, "If you have been your party's nominee for 12 years in a row...and you can not grow your movement pretty much at all and can't pursue any successful strategy and all you do is show up once every four years to speak to people who are justifiably pissed off, you are not serious. It's to me not authentic, it's just predatory."
summary: AOC called Jill Stein predatory and said, "If you have been your party's nominee for 12 years in a row...and you can not grow your movement pretty much at all and can't pursue any successful strategy and all you do is show up once every four years to speak to people who are justifiably pissed off, you are not serious. It's to me not authentic, it's just predatory."

title: 'Barron, Barron your father's been shot': Trump recalls how Melania, son came to know about assassination bid
content: "Melania was watching it on the television and Barron was outside having a tennis lesson. He's a good tennis player. Someone ran up to him and said Barron, Barron your father's been shot. He loves his father. He's a good kid, he's a good student, a good athlete," Trump said in a recent Fox interview ahead of the release of his book 'Save America'.
summary: "Melania was watching it on the television and Barron was outside having a tennis lesson. He's a good tennis player. Someone ran up to him and said Barron, Barron your father's been shot. He loves his father. He's a good kid, he's a good student, a good athlete," Trump said in a recent Fox interview ahead of the release of his book 'Save America'.

title: Donald Trump says 'nasty Kamala' treated Mike Pence horribly. Democrats tell him 'you're f**king fried'
content: ​"Now they have Kamala who they say have many deficiencies but she's a nasty person, The way she treated Mike Pence was horrible. The way she treats people is horrible. But the way she treated Justice Kavanaugh during the hearing, in the history of Congress nobody has been treated so badly," Trump said. Democrats on social media asked whether this was worse than what he did -- sent a mob demanding Mike Pence's hanging during the Capitol Riot in 2021.
summary: ​"Now they have Kamala who they say have many deficiencies but she's a nasty person, The way she treated Mike Pence was horrible. The way she treats people is horrible. But the way she treated Justice Kavanaugh during the hearing, in the history of Congress nobody has been treated so badly," Trump said. Democrats on social media asked whether this was worse than what he did -- sent a mob demanding Mike Pence's hanging during the Capitol Riot in 2021.

title: Is Trump’s viral dance a hit or a miss? Internet reacts to his Moms for Liberty performance, watch video
content: Donald Trump’s dance performance at the Moms for Liberty event in Washington DC captured significant online attention. While his political remarks were anticipated, his impromptu dance with co-founder Tiffany Justice went viral. Trump supporters praised his high energy, whereas critics labeled it as embarrassing. The event highlighted a mix of admiration and skepticism on social media.
summary: Donald Trump’s dance performance at the Moms for Liberty event in Washington DC captured significant online attention. While his political remarks were anticipated, his impromptu dance with co-founder Tiffany Justice went viral. Trump supporters praised his high energy, whereas critics labeled it as embarrassing. The event highlighted a mix of admiration and skepticism on social media.

title: Clooney hails Biden's decision to exit 2024 race: 'His withdrawal a selfless act echoing George Washington'
content: George Clooney has lauded President Joe Biden's decision to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race, calling it a selfless act. Clooney's New York Times op-ed noted the impact of age on Biden's abilities and supported a new nominee. Biden cited pressures from party elites as a major factor in his decision.
summary: George Clooney has lauded President Joe Biden's decision to withdraw from the 2024 presidential race, calling it a selfless act. Clooney's New York Times op-ed noted the impact of age on Biden's abilities and supported a new nominee. Biden cited pressures from party elites as a major factor in his decision.

title: 'Huge number of ballistic missiles' hit Ukraine, Kyiv forces down dozens of Russian drones: Key details
content: Kyiv endured a significant missile attack early Monday, marking Russia’s third major offensive on Ukraine in a week. A mix of missiles and drones were used, with Ukrainian air defenses intercepting many. Despite the assault, schools in Kyiv remain operational, equipped with bomb shelters for protection following regulations implemented since Russia's 2022 invasion.
summary: Kyiv endured a significant missile attack early Monday, marking Russia’s third major offensive on Ukraine in a week. A mix of missiles and drones were used, with Ukrainian air defenses intercepting many. Despite the assault, schools in Kyiv remain operational, equipped with bomb shelters for protection following regulations implemented since Russia's 2022 invasion.

title: Fridgescaping takes over social media: Why people are transforming their fridges into works of art
content: Fridgescaping, gaining popularity on social media, involves decorating refrigerator interiors with ornate items like picture frames and flowers. Initially focused on neat organization, it now turns fridges into stylish showcases. This trend enhances food visibility, reduces waste, and boosts meal creativity, while maintaining cleanliness. Not everyone agrees, but it has practical benefits.
summary: Fridgescaping, gaining popularity on social media, involves decorating refrigerator interiors with ornate items like picture frames and flowers. Initially focused on neat organization, it now turns fridges into stylish showcases. This trend enhances food visibility, reduces waste, and boosts meal creativity, while maintaining cleanliness. Not everyone agrees, but it has practical benefits.

title: Australian ex-childcare worker Ashley Paul Griffith pleads guilty to sexual abuse of some 60 girls
content: Ashley Paul Griffith, a former childcare worker, pleaded guilty to raping, sexually abusing, and exploiting dozens of girls in Australia and Italy between 2003 and 2022. Facing 307 charges concerning around 60 children, Griffith's sentencing is expected to take more than two days due to the inclusion of victim impact statements.
summary: Ashley Paul Griffith, a former childcare worker, pleaded guilty to raping, sexually abusing, and exploiting dozens of girls in Australia and Italy between 2003 and 2022. Facing 307 charges concerning around 60 children, Griffith's sentencing is expected to take more than two days due to the inclusion of victim impact statements.

title: Royal rift? How Prince William and Princess Kate's choices could disappoint King Charles
content: Prince William and Princess Kate are considering changing a long-standing royal tradition, which could cause concern for King Charles. They are encouraged to establish a home in Wales to build a stronger connection with its people, following King Charles's example. Their decision could impact their future roles, balancing tradition and modernity.
summary: Prince William and Princess Kate are considering changing a long-standing royal tradition, which could cause concern for King Charles. They are encouraged to establish a home in Wales to build a stronger connection with its people, following King Charles's example. Their decision could impact their future roles, balancing tradition and modernity.

title: SpaceX rocket explosion rips hole in earth's upper atmosphere: Study
content: A study by Russian scientists reveals that an explosion of a SpaceX Starship rocket on November 18, 2023, caused a temporary hole in the Earth's ionosphere—an unprecedented phenomenon for a human-made explosion. The incident underscores the profound environmental impacts of space exploration gone awry, urging a closer look at technological advancements.
summary: A study by Russian scientists reveals that an explosion of a SpaceX Starship rocket on November 18, 2023, caused a temporary hole in the Earth's ionosphere—an unprecedented phenomenon for a human-made explosion. The incident underscores the profound environmental impacts of space exploration gone awry, urging a closer look at technological advancements.
